name: Naturalchimie Classic Demake
description:
An old game from my childhood, Naturalchimie, no longer can be played online. Well, I can fix that! Kind of. Here's a demake of it in Pico 8.

My very first game in Pico 8, as well as the first time I do pixel art as well as sounds. Also, the first project I completely finish. Thanks, pico 8's constraints!

Arrows to move the elements, Z or X to drop them. Join three or more of the same kind to produce one of the next. Reach gold!

You can see the original game here, as well as play the updated version that replaced my childhood :(
